long_description: These 1-of-a-kind Chooze Spin girls' slip-on shoes feature spunky fabrics that celebrate her creative energy. As a Good Returns company, Chooze invests its profits in anti-poverty programs that provide training, support and loans to women so they can start their own businesses. Right and left shoes feature same fabric, but design sections are never identical; each shoe is unique. 100% cotton fabric breathes well for comfort in warm weather. Elastic instep band helps secure the fit. Antimicrobial memory foam insoles offer step-in comfort and resist odors. Rubber outsoles on the Chooze Spin shoes offer reliable grip on a variety of surfaces. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: These 1-of-a-kind Chooze Spin girls' slip-on shoes feature spunky fabrics that celebrate her creative energy.
